text_en: In today's fast-paced world, stress and anxiety have become increasingly prevalent, impacting our overall well-being and quality of life. Fortunately, science-based tools and techniques are available to help us effectively manage these challenges. By incorporating these strategies into our daily routines, we can cultivate resilience and promote mental health.
text_zh: 在当今快节奏的世界中，压力和焦虑变得日益普遍，影响到我们的整体健康和生活质量。幸运的是，基于科学的工具和技术可以帮助我们有效地应对这些挑战。通过将这些策略融入我们的日常生活中，我们可以培养韧性，促进心理健康。
